'''Radiant Spincrystal 19''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Before Dawn, at the Winery]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a barrel at the back of [[Dawn Winery Manor]].
